CamMode.Name: Fixed Shop Viewpoint
CamMode.Tooltip: Camera exhibits fixed behaviors and viewpoint changing is handled by shops

CamMode.Name: Fixed Toggle Viewpoint
CamMode.Tooltip: Camera exhibits fixed behaviors and viewpoint can be toggled with c-up

CamMode.Name: Fixed
CamMode.Tooltip: Camera exhibits fixed behaviors (see `Play_CamIsNotFixed` usages for examples)

CamMode.Name: Fixed Market
CamMode.Tooltip: Camera exhibits fixed behaviors and delays textboxes by a small amount before they start to appear

CamMode.Name: Shooting Gallery
CamMode.Tooltip: Unreferenced in code, used only by the main layer of the shooting gallery scene
